title: If TXT had positions, which positions would you give each member? (I know they don't have positions, this is out of curiosity) - Quora

response.answer_text: There official Position are this: Soobin: Leader, Vocal, Rapper, Dancer Yeonjun: Vocal, Rapper, Dancer Beomgyu: Vocal, Rapper, Dancer, Center,Visual Taehyun: Vocal, Rapper,Dancer Kai: Vocal,Rapper, Dancer,Visual Al rounded is Kai and Beomgyu but Beomgyu more because he is the center of the group lol. The Official Position will be this: Soobin : Leader, Lead Vocal, Sub Rapper Yeonjun: Main Rapper, Main Dancer, Sub Vocal Beomgyu: Main Dancer, Lead Rapper, Sub Vocal, Visual, Center Taehyun: Main Vocal,.Sub Rapper Kai: Main Vocal, Lead Dancer, Rapper, Visual

Hmmm… if I am Mr. Bang Si Hyuk and I’ll give TXT positions, I would give them this: Yeonjun - Main Rapper, Lead Vocalist, Main Dancer, Center Soobin - Lead Vocalist, Lead Dancer, Face of the Group Beomgyu - Lead Vocalist, Lead Dancer, Sub Rapper Taehyun - Main Vocalist, Lead Dancer Kai - Lead Rapper, Sub Vocalist, Maknae And the visuals? I think all of them are.
